Package MOBLIMA.listing

Class movieListing

java.lang.Object
MOBLIMA.listing.movieListing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listing
public class movieListing extends Object implements Listing
Helper class to display the appropriate movies based on the user and obtains the a selected movie.
